author: Special Correspondent
text:
The South Zone Culture Centre will organise the annual Salangai Naadam festival on its premises here from January 9 to 17. The festival will include folk and tribal dances, classical art performances, and drama.

Governor K. Rosaiah will inaugurate the festival at 5.30 p.m. on January 9, according to a press release from E.N.Sajith, Director, South Zone Cultural Centre, Thanjavur.

A craft exhibition will be organised as part of the festival, the release added.
title: Salangai Naadam festival from January 9 to 17
